title: AI Summit 2026 LIVE Updates: PM Modi, Sam Altman to speak today at Bharat Mandapam, Bill Gates skips
snippet: Delhi AI Summit 2026 LIVE: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is scheduled to speak at the opening ceremony of India AI Impact Summit on 19 February, Thursday. Apart from PM Modi, key business and tech leaders like Mukesh Ambani, Sam Altman, and Bill Gates will also address keynote sessions.

title: Software firms won’t die, AI models can’t work independently: ServiceNow COO
snippet: Enterprises will never simply go and adopt a barebones model for the work they do—they want trust, compliance, a team to fall back on, security, and compatibility with many distributed services in an organization, says ServiceNow COO Amit Zavery.

title: 'Misinformation cannot be encouraged, essential that a code is followed':  MeitY Secy on Galgotia Universitys robodog controversy
snippet: The Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology (MeitY) has addressed the removal of the Galgotias University stall from a recent expo, citing the need to prevent the spread of misinformation at official events.

title: AI pioneer Stuart Russell warns of catastrophic risks at New Delhi summit: ‘Off by a factor of 10 to 50 million’
snippet: During the AI Safety Connect Day on Wednesday, AI Pioneer Stuart Russell highlighted the existential threats posed by advanced AI systems while urging for stricter regulations.&nbsp;

title: ‘Misinformation cannot be encouraged’: IT Secretary S. Krishnan on RoboDog controversy
snippet: S. Krishnan, IT Secretary, urged authenticity after Galgotias University was asked to vacate its stall at the India AI Impact Summit 2026 over a viral video showing a RoboDog misrepresented as the university’s own innovation. The university apologised for the confusion.

title: In India visit, Google DeepMind chief pitches key role in public AI utilities
snippet: During an India visit, DeepMind's leadership highlighted the potential for AI to revolutionize Indian agriculture and climate science, while warning of the dual-use risks posed by nation-state actors.

title: Google Pixel 10a launched in India at  ₹49,999 with 120Hz display and Tensor G4: Specifications and features
snippet: Google Pixel 10a launches in India at  ₹49,999 with a 6.3-inch 120Hz display, Tensor G4 chip, 48MP dual cameras and a 5,100mAh battery. Running Android 16, it promises seven years of updates, IP68 protection and wireless charging. Pre-orders begin at 9pm IST, sales start 6 March.

title: Google Pixel 10a India launch live: Expected price, specs, offers, availability and more
snippet: Google Pixel 10a debuts in India today, with pre-orders opening on Flipkart and the Google Store. Expected to feature Tensor G4, Android 16, 45W charging and 7 years of updates, the mid-range smartphone’s official India price and offers will be revealed tonight.

title: Explained| India sets Guinness World Record with 2.5 lakh AI responsibility pledges in 24 hours - What it means
snippet: India sets a Guinness World Record with 250,946 pledges in 24 hours under the IndiaAI Mission’s AI Responsibility campaign. Announced at the India AI Impact Summit 2026, the milestone highlights the country’s push for ethical, inclusive and responsible artificial intelligence adoption.

title: Pixel 10a set to debut in India today: Expected price, features, specifications and more
snippet: Google is set to launch the Pixel 10a globally, including India, with pre-orders opening at 9 pm IST. The mid-range smartphone is expected to feature Android 16, Tensor G4, a 6.3-inch OLED display, 45W charging and seven years of software updates, with pricing yet to be confirmed.

title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT joins hands with Pine Labs to enable agentic commerce
snippet: With this integration, Pine Labs becomes OpenAI’s first payments partner for ChatGPT in India, allowing merchants on its network to process transactions initiated through AI-led interfaces.

title: Meta reboots smartwatch plan, aims debut in 2026: Report
snippet: The company has revived its "Malibu 2" smartwatch project, the report said, adding that the device, set for release later this ‌year, will ⁠feature ⁠health tracking and a built-in Meta AI assistant.
